metadata.name: Letter to my demon
metadata.description:
A letter being written to a demon who is seen as a friend and companion 
“είναι οι μοναχικές μέρες χωρίς εσένα” meaning “it’s lonely days without thee”

“In the shadows
All was expected, but a friend 
Soft, dark but hallow
Seems like a corridor of no end
For this path I chose to follow 
Thy presence was there with me till the very end”

Graphit pencil on paper.
